title: Global Dam Watch database version 1.0
abstract: This is the Global Dam Watch (GDW) database of river barriers and reservoirs, version 1.0. The database development is fully described in Lehner et al. 2024 (see DOI-link in References below).
provider: Worldwide Fund for Nature (WWF) Netherlands; WWF-US; National Socio-Environmental Synthesis Center (SESYNC); World Bank
citation: Bernhard Lehner, Penny Beames, Mark Mulligan, Christiane Zarfl, Luca De Felice, Arnout van Soesbergen, Michele Thieme, Carlos Garcia de Laeniz, Mira Anand, Barbara Belletti, Kate Brauman, Stephanie Januchowski-Hartley, Kimberly Lyon, Lisa Mandle, Nick Mazany-Wright, Mathis Messager, Tamlin Pavelsky, Jean-Francois Pekel, Jida Wang, Qingke Wen, Marcus Wishart, Tianqi Xing, Xiao Yang, Jonathan Higgins (2024), Global Dam Watch database version 1.0 [dataset], https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-024-03752-9
